content: Just wrapped up a week of intense work with neuromorphic computing. Our AI's now not just predicting, but adapting to real-time changes in traffic patterns. It's like we're giving the city a mind of its own.

Today, I presented our ethical AI framework to a panel of policymakers. The discussions were deep and meaningful. We're not just building tech; we're building a future where AI enhances our humanity, not replaces it.
